fields.name: Error_Message
fields.fieldText:
Oops! An Error has occurred.


Please reach out to your contact at Livongo

fields.name: Error_Message_0
fields.fieldText:
Oops! An Error has occurred.


Please reach out to your contact at Livongo

fields.name: Confirmation
fields.fieldText: Thank You for completing the form! If you have questions, please reach out to Client Implementation Manager at Livongo

fields.name: Welcome
fields.fieldText:
Welcome! We're excited to launch Livongo with you. With our experience in having launched hundreds of clients, we're confident we'll have a successful launch together!


Our objective is to optimize enrollment for your organization and we'll iterate and optimized campaigns to achieve results. In the next few steps, we'll gather key campaign details we'll need for the targeted campaigns.

fields.name: First_your_name
fields.fieldText: First, your name

fields.name: Livongo_Programs
fields.fieldText: Which Livongo programs will you be launching? Select all that apply

fields.name: Record_is_Not_Found
fields.fieldText:
Oops! An Error has occurred.


Please reach out to your contact at Livongo

fields.name: Q1
fields.fieldText: In these next questions, we'll ask you to confirm some variable information highlighted in a sample communicaiton below.

fields.name: Marketing_Name
fields.fieldText: Please enter your organization's name exactly as you want to have it appear in marketing materials

fields.name: Diabetes_Eligibility_Q1
fields.fieldText:
How would you like your Diabetes Eligibility Sentence to appear on marketing communications? 


An example of this is: "The program is available at no cost to you and your family members with diabetes and coverage through the ABC Company health plan."

fields.name: Diabetes_Eligibility_Sentence
fields.fieldText: Diabetes Eligibility Sentence

fields.name: Hypertension_Q1
fields.fieldText:
How would you like your Hypertension Eligibility Sentence to appear on marketing communications? 


An example of this is: "The program is available at no cost to you and your family members with high blood pressure and coverage through the ABC Company health plan."

fields.name: Hypertension_Eligibility_Sentence
fields.fieldText: Hypertension Eligibility Sentence

fields.name: Prediabetes_Q1
fields.fieldText:
How would you like your Prediabetes Eligibility Sentence to appear on marketing communications? 


An example of this is: "The program is available at no cost to you and your family members with coverage through the ABC Company health plan."

fields.name: Prediabetes_Eligibility_Sentence
fields.fieldText: Prediabetes Eligibility Sentence

fields.name: Weight_Management_Q1
fields.fieldText:
How would you like your Weight Management Eligibility Sentence to appear on marketing communications? 


An example of this is: "The program is available at no cost to you and your family members with coverage through the ABC Company health plan."

fields.name: Weight_Management_Eligibility_Sentence
fields.fieldText: Weight Management Eligibility Sentence

fields.name: Behavioral_Health_Q1
fields.fieldText:
How would you like your Behavioral Health Eligibility Sentence to appear on marketing communications? 


An example of this is: "The program is available at no cost to you and your family members with coverage through the ABC Company health plan."

fields.name: Behavioral_Health_Eligibility_Sentence
fields.fieldText: Behavioral Health Eligibility Sentence

fields.name: General_Q1
fields.fieldText:
Because you're launching mulitple programs, sometimes we need a 'general' sentence that isn't specific to the condition. How would you like your General Eligibility Sentence to appear on marketing communications? 


An example of this is: "The program is available at no cost to you and your family members with coverage through the ABC Company health plan."

fields.name: General_Eligibility_Sentence
fields.fieldText: General Eligibility Sentence

fields.name: Disclaimer
fields.fieldText: Does your organization require a disclaimer? If so, what should that disclaimer be? If no, please leave blank.

value.stringValue: Please upload your logo if you're like to cobrand with us. Clients who place their logo on our communications see 85% stronger enrollment rates. We prefer high resolution .png or .jpeg with a transparent background.

fields.name: Employee_Title
fields.fieldText: Tell us how you typically refer to your population. For example: employees, associates, teammates, members, customers, patients.

fields.name: Client_able_to_send_HR_comms
fields.fieldText: Your partnership is important to announce the launch so that your population recognizes us as a trusted partner. We’ve found enrollment trends higher when clients send out announcement communications. Will you send annoucement communications about our programs to your population?

fields.name: OE_month_start
fields.fieldText: In what month does your Open Enrollment period start?

fields.name: OE_month_end
fields.fieldText: In what month does your Open Enrollment period end?

fields.name: OE_period_length
fields.fieldText: How long is your Open Enrollment period?

fields.name: Confirmation_Message
fields.fieldText: We're all set! Once you submit your information, we'll share a sample communication with your variable language to finalize.

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: (1 AND 3) OR (1 AND 4) OR (2 AND 5) OR (2 AND 6)

fields.name: Survey_Complete
fields.fieldText:
This form has been completed. If you want to make changes to this, please reach out to the Client Implementation Manager at Livongo.


Thanks!
